CustomBehavior.Macro: /run for i=1,GetNumQuestLogEntries() do SelectQuestLogEntry(i); SetAbandonQuest(); AbandonQuest(); end
/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q < 4 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)PickupMerchantItem(0)end end end end
/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q < 4 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)DeleteCursorItem()end end end end

/run for i=0,4 do for j=1,GetContainerNumSlots(i)do l=GetContainerItemLink(i,j)if l then _,_,q=GetItemInfo(l)if q < 4 then PickupContainerItem(i,j)DeleteCursorItem()end end end end
